lines.text: 45, you can have the bathroom all day if you'd like.
I wouldn't know what to do in the bathroom all day!
I don't know why you wanted a room, you spend all of your time outside!

[Referring to bedlam at police headquarters]
You say all you have to do is place an advertisement on the bulletin board?
It's not a big MaGilla, unless it IS a big MaGilla.
